stays.title: Private Balcony Room ❤ 1m walk from Rothschild Blv
stays.description:
Large spacious room with private balcony in a boutique guesthouse with a rooftop located in the very heart of the city, right next to the famous Rothschild boulevard, and walking distance to most major sites in Tel Aviv as well as a short walk to the beach.

**The space**
*Shared rooftop
*Queen size bed
*Private Balcony
*Fresh linen & towels
*Complimentary Toiletries
*working Desk
*TV with local channels and Chromecast
* Full AC & Heater Unit
*Map With Local Recommendations
*Hair dryer, Iron & Plug adapters
* 24h Self check in
*Fast Wifi
*Fully equip kitchen
*Filtered cold or Hot Water
*Coffee/Tea
*1 Min From Rothschild Blv

**Guest access**
Guests will have full access to a fully equip kitchen with a comfortable dining area to make a tasty breakfast in the morning. In addition guests will have access to the balcony to enjoy a beer in the evenings as well as a small library with books on Tel aviv to help plan your day.

In addition guests will now have full access to our lovely rooftop to enjoy the evening with a glass of wine :)

**Other things to note**
Due to Covid 19 I would like to share some of the extra cleaning measures we are taking now to keep our guests safe and healthy:

*All sheets, towels and rugs are washed in high temperatures (90°).
*All surfaces, handles and buttons in shared space are cleaned on a daily basis with special anti bacteria spray.
*The room is thoroughly aired out for a few hours before check in.
*cleaning team will wear disposable masks and gloves at all times.
*Hand sanitizer napkins supplied in all rooms.

host.about: Hi, my name is Tomer, and welcome to Tel Aviv! It is a beautiful city and I am sure you'll love it! I am more than happy to answer any questions or request you might have and will do so as fast as possible. Looking forward to hearing from you! I wish you a pleasant stay in Tel Aviv :) Tomer
host.duringStay: I commit to help with every request or question you may encounter upon staying at my apartment.

loc.desc: The apartment is in an excellent location! It is situated in one of the main streets of Tel Aviv, adjacent to Dizengoff Str, at which a variety of supermarkets, gyms, coffee shops, bars, restaurants, convenience stores, banks and ATM's, drugstores, bicycle rentals, hair dressers and much more can be found. It is also just a 1 minute walk away from the beach! Even though the apartment is in the city centre it is situated in a quiet side-street, so the noise levels are not of any annoyance and the nights are peacefully quiet.
loc.getAround: The apartment is only 2 minutes walk from the next Bus station. There are also long distance Bus stations near by, bicycle rentals and taxis.

reviews.txt:
Tomer is a great host. Always available for any questions. 
The location was perfect, close to the beach. There’s a public parking right by the apartment. 
Everything was perfect! 
Thank you Tomer!!
Tomer is as good as they come. The apartment is great and the location is even better. Tomer is super responsive and fixed any issues that came up immediately. Highly recommend.

We arrived to TLV and Tomer was just great! He helped us with all our questions like where we should eat at night? to Where is the best sunset location!? Tomer was very responsive when we needed (24/7). The apartment was actually 1 min for the beach !! Thanks for helping us having a great time (:
5 stars! Great location, nice and clean apartment with all the necessary amenities.

This place is in the best location in Tel Aviv. Very near the sea and the promenade. Also near restaurants and bars. The apartment is dark and the photos appear to have been taken years ago. The apartment is not “luxury” as the furniture, pillows, rugs are old. Does not feel fresh and clean. Tomer is great. Very responsive and nice. The apt. Has all the amenities. Nice, fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer.
The place was spacious and clean and very close to the beach. It had everything we needed and was nicely decorated. Great stay!

stays.title: Modern Apartment w/ Garden 2 min from the Beach
stays.description:
A modern apartment 2 min walking to the best beach in the city! It is fully equipped and you will love it!
It has 2 bedrooms and a living room and suitable for 4-5 guests.
It has a nice outdoor garden private only for you.
The area is great and central: Your'e walking distance from the most famous Carmel Market, the best beaches and a lot of historical building you won't be able to miss!
I'm an experienced host and will make sure your stay here is pleasant and safe

**The space**
It's a spacious house near the beach, has 2 bedrooms, 1 living room and a garden. It's fully equipped so you can cook and use the house as it yours

**Guest access**
All the place is yours!

stays.title: Brand new 1BDR w/ balcony on Sheinkin st
stays.description:
A beautifully designed and comfortable apartment with a terrace in the heart of Shenkin.
Located in the trendy area of the Carmel Market, this apartment offers one bedroom, one living room, an open kitchen, and a terrace.
In the bedroom, there is a double bed and a wardrobe.
In the living room, you have a sitting and dining area.
The sofa accomodates two additional guests.  There is a flat-screen TV with international and local channels. 
There is a furnished balcony, with a small table and chairs.
The kitchen is fully furnished and has all the appliances you might need for cooking.
Your comfort is important to us so we make sure our apartments are equipped with all the necessary appliances you may need while you are away. We provide: coffee, cleaning supplies, cooking appliances and an iron.
Fresh, clean sheets and towels are of course provided.
The apartment can accommodate up to 4 people. Perfect for family and friends.
We are happy to assist you with further services as needed.

stays.title: Marina Ben Gurion Hostel Dormitorie room SEA FRONT
stays.description:
Enjoy your authentic middle eastern vacation with the breath-taking Tel Avivian sunset. Sitting right above the always bustling tayelet and nuzzled between the Marina and Ben Gurion Boulevard, Marina Ben Gurion is a brand new Hostel in the refurbished young and lively Kikar Atarim.

**The space**
dorm room 10 houses 3 bunk beds, a toilet and shower, air conditioning, and wifi. The reservations in this room are relevant towards a single bed. Just like a dorm you will have the experience of sharing a room with new people.
Right outside the hostel room you have access to a newly finished outdoor courtyard and kitchen. This shared urban yard is perfect for gathering in small groups, as well as taking time to use the shared outdoor kitchen, filled with new appliances. However, what truly makes Marina Ben Gurion Hostel one of a kind is the partnership with local NPO The Social Space. Proceeds from Marina Ben Gurion contribute to social action in issues like gender inequality. The Social Space is a platform for deepening the discourse and encouraging involvement in social action.

**Guest access**
Having Gordon Beach as your front yard, beach proximity is what we are known for. Activities like surfing, sailing, paddleboarding, and the Gordon Pool are right at your fingertips. Effortless beach days are all yours. After the beach, you can spend your evenings at Dizengoff Center, Jaffa, or Neve Tzedek, as we are centrally located and surrounded by cafes, restaurants, bars, nightlife, and cultural attractions.

stays.title: Abraham Hostel - 12 Bed female Dorm
stays.description: The perfect space for solo adventurers looking to meet people from all over the world! You’ll love my place becausthe huge communal kitchen, great bar and lots of free events. Each room features bunk beds, lockers and en suite facilities, as well as

amenities.desc: Towels, bed sheets, soap, toilet paper, and pillows
A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Available throughout the listing.
Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper.
Space where guests can cook their own meals.

host.about: Hi Abraham here, The first ever backpacker :) My dream is to bring my biblical hospitality to the 21st century. I started hosting people over 10 years ago in a small guest house in Nazareth. I wanted to give people a home away from home, providing everything they needed under one roof. Great accommodation, great information and warm welcoming people that would help others explore and discover the world. 5 years later I was hosting people in Jerusalem too, helping them to discover the fascinating city and giving them a safe, engaging and comforting base to explore from. Now I am in the big, vibrant, exciting city of Tel Aviv. A home on the road, Abraham Hostel Tel Aviv is a melting pot of multiculturalism, bringing together an international community of travellers. Hosting guests from around the world who enjoy our warm atmosphere, convenient location, friendly staff, daily events and tours, and extensive facilities. Since living here I am able to roam the streets of Old Jaffa and it's eclectic flea market, discover the hidden street art of the edgy Florentine neighbourhood, taste the delights of the Carmel and Levinsky markets and chill everyday on the beach. I love nothing more to sit in a local coffee house watching the world pass by on Rothschild Boulevard, soaking in the city and it's people. This is what I want to share with my guests.

stays.title: ♥Jaffa w/balcony & private shower♥
stays.description:
After a few years of renting out our flat in Germany and receiving great reviews from our amazing guests, we feel that it's time to share our private residence with the people of Airbnb. Join us & experience the magic of Jaffa like a local.

**The space**
We are a German-Israeli family with 2 kids and we are always happy when our friends and family from abroad are visiting us. Therefor, we put our love & passion into preparing a lovely room for our guests to enjoy. Now we are ready to offer it to the rest of the world :)

The room has a double bed (140cm) and fresh bed linens and towels are, of course, provided.

The room has direct access to our 30m² Sunny (shared) balcony, where you can enjoy the sun and the Jaffa breeze.

Right next to the room, there's our guest-only shower & bathroom, waiting just for you!

We love hosting. We love making our guests feel welcomed. We love details and practicality. We enjoy preparing our guestroom for our visitors. We enjoy watching them falling in Love with Tel-Aviv, falling in Love with Jaffa. We are happy to show the world that Jews, Muslims & Christians can live together in the same city, in the same neighborhood, in the same building - sharing a coffee, a shisha, an ideology.

**Guest access**
* Access our balcony directly from your room. just don't forget to wear Sunscreen ;)
* Private shower and bathroom are 10 cm from your door. Fresh towels included.
* Air conditioner is controlled by the apartment's central unite - if you wish to heat or cool your room, please let us know.
* Filtered fresh drinking water available - hot & cold.
* Free(!) parking on the street 24/7.
* A nice collection of books in Hebrew, German and English available for your pleasure.
* The apartment is wheelchair accessible via parking garage and elevator (with a little help from a friend - there are two stairs to conquer).
* You are very welcome to use our dishes and cutlery, store food in the fridge and use our coffee/tea corner 24/7 (but please - no cooking).

loc.desc:
* Jaffa (or Yāfō or Japho or Yaffa) is the southern, oldest part of Tel Aviv-Yafo, an ancient port city in Israel.
* Jaffa is famous for its association with the biblical stories of Solomon, Jonah, and Saint Peter.
* Jaffa is a major tourist attraction with an exciting combination of old, new and restored buildings. It offers art galleries, souvenir shops, exclusive restaurants, sidewalk cafes, boardwalks and shopping opportunities. It offers a rich variety of culture, entertainment and food (fish restaurants).
* The city is noted for its export of the famous Jaffa oranges.
* Jaffa has a heterogeneous population of Jews, Christians, and Muslims.
loc.getAround:
* Everything in Jaffa is in walking distance - The sea, landmarks, sights, amazing food, churches, shopping and more.
* Bus station is right around the corner, with frequent buses to Tel-Aviv and the central bus station.
* Tel-Aviv's rent-a-bike (Tel-Ofan) station is just a block away.
* Walk just 2 beautiful kilometers along the seaside, to Tel-Aviv, Hatachana compound (old train station) and Neve Tzedek neighborhood.
* Jaffa seaside park - 9 min walk.
* Jaffa port and the old city - 12 min walk.
* Flea Market - 13 min walk.
* Our favorite beach - 17 min walk.
* Best Hummus in the world 5 or 10 min walk.
* Other neighborhoods within a walking distance: Noga, Florentine and the American Colony.

amenities.desc: Towels, bed sheets, soap, toilet paper, and pillows
A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Available throughout the listing.
Grill, charcoal, bamboo skewers/iron skewers, etc.
Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper.
Space where guests can cook their own meals.
Beach towels, umbrella, beach blanket, snorkeling gear.
Guests can enjoy a nearby beach.
Separate street or building entrance.
The home or building has an elevator that’s at least 52 inches deep and a doorway at least 32 inches wide.
Check yourself in with the lockbox.
You'll have the place to yourself.
